headline: Key Strengths and Areas for Improvement as a Restaurant Owner

areas_of_excellence.what_to_keep: Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter und ein sehr netter Ton sowie personalisiertes Kunden-Servelementsystem.
High quality food that is well received by customers.
areas_of_excellence.how_to_market_it: Promote your high caliber dishes as signature items or chef's specials.

areas_of_excellence.what_to_keep: Niceties in personal interactions, like being super friendly and pleasantly surprising customers during service encounters.
areas_of_excellence.how_to_market_it: Highlight these positive human interaction experiences on your restaurant's social media pages or website to attract more guests.

areas_of_excellence.what_to_keep: Positive personal interactions during order process, where the waiter is friendly and attentive.
areas_of_excellence.how_to_market_it: Promote these positive service encounters through customer testimonials or video content on your online platforms.

areas_of_excellence.what_to_keep: 'Unsachgemäßer' Kundenservice reaction which can be turned into an opportunity for improvement. This implies there is scope to improve service efficiency and responsiveness.
areas_of_excellence.how_to_market_it: Promote your efforts towards improving customer engagement through personalized services, quick response times etc.
